name: ESPN Great Outdoor Games: Bass 2002
description:
Back of Box - Game Boy Advance (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

ESPN Great Outdoor Games: Bass Tournament

Fishermen rejoice: 3 vast lakes with 30 beautiful locations and lots of bass! Familiarise yourself with the different types of lure and fishing techniques to compete against computer opponents or a friend for the biggest bass you've ever landed on your Game Boy Advance™!
developedBy: Konami Computer Entertainment Osaka Co., Ltd.

releases.developer: Konami Computer Entertainment Osaka Co., Ltd.
